attributes.action: Discuss whether citizens were misinformed during the EU Referendum, resolve.
attributes.additional_details: See the political and economic commentary on the existential threat to the UK after the June EU Referendum.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon Parliament to debate the question of the veracity of the processes used by parties in their arguments to the general public during the June 2016 EU Referendum campaign.

rejection.details:
We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139525
